flavor.reason: The Schmitter sandwich and other menu items are highly praised for their unique and delicious flavors, though some dishes were noted as overly salty or dry.

freshness.reason: Ingredients are fresh and of high quality, with made-to-order sandwiches and house-made items, though occasional dryness in some dishes was mentioned.

service.reason: Staff is friendly and welcoming, but there are reports of inconsistent service, particularly for first-time visitors.

environment.reason: The tavern has a cozy and historic atmosphere, though the small space can feel cramped and the basement bathroom setup may be challenging for some.

value.reason: Prices are reasonable for the quality of food, though the lack of a fryer and limited beer selection were noted as minor downsides.
